name: Stack-A-Cat
description:
Submission to Mini jam 127- Cats

----------------------------------------------------

Cats are big fellas with big dreams, so big that you might have to stack them. Stack em high, stack em VERY high, and help them achieve their dream, feel horrible if you fail! It's all part of the game!

----------------------------------------------------

CONTROLS:

Mouse

Click on cat to rotate in the selection bar

 ----------------------------------------------------

CREDITS:
